body_html: Thanks for the report! Just note that you shouldn't use the forward method of the module, but call it like a function instead. It won't fix the bug, but it's quite important, because the hooks won't work properly without that.
body_text: Thanks for the report! Just note that you shouldn't use the forward method of the module, but call it like a function instead. It won't fix the bug, but it's quite important, because the hooks won't work properly without that.
body: Thanks for the report! Just note that you shouldn't use the forward method of the module, but call it like a function instead. It won't fix the bug, but it's quite important, because the hooks won't work properly without that.
